Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Angels are 54-79 this season and have lost seven games in a row.
The Detroit Tigers are 68-66 this year and have won six games in a row.

Detroit is starting Keider Montero, who has allowed two earned runs or fewer in three of his last four starts.
Los Angeles is starting Jack Kochanowicz, who has a 6.08 ERA and has allowed two earned runs in two of his last three starts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the third game in the series.
